text: Anan Ameri is an American museum director and writer. She won a Palestine Book Award. The Arab Community Center for Economic and Social Services named her 2020 Arab American of the Year. In 2005, The Detroit News named her Michiganian of the Year. == Life == She was born in Damascus. She studied at Wayne State University. She was founding Director of the Palestine Aid Society of America. She was founding director of the Arab American National Museum. == Works == * The Scent of Jasmine Interlink Books. May 2017. * == References == Category:Living people Category:Writers from Washington, D.C. Category:People from Damascus Category:1944 births Category:Cairo University alumni
title: Anan Ameri
